message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I believe this price reflects its true value. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay $700,000 for it. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise given our respective valuations. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $700,000 is simply too low for me.  While I want to make this deal work, I need to ensure I'm compensated fairly. How about we split the difference and agree on $850,000?  This gives you a great deal and ensures I get a reasonable return on my product. Let's make this happen!
